mapper.sql: select menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, `query`, is_frame, is_cache, menu_type, visible, status, ifnull(perms,'') as perms, icon, create_time from menu
mapper.select: select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
select count(1) from menu where parent_id = #{menuId}
